code:
---
title: "gRPC Project Template - Architecture & Dependencies"
config:
  flowchart:
    htmlLabels: false
    nodeSpacing: 30
    rankSpacing: 50
---
flowchart TB
    %% Build & Deploy Layer
    subgraph build [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        direction LR
        MakefileCloudRun[FinTech_AuthVault]
        Dockerfile[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        Makefile[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        
        MakefileCloudRun -->|"build-docker"| Dockerfile
        Dockerfile -->|"make build"| Makefile
    end

    %% Entry Point
    subgraph entry [FinTech_FraudDetection]
        MainGo[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    %% Configuration Layer  
    subgraph config [FinTech_AuthVault]
        ConfigEnv[FinTech_LedgerService]
        ConfigGrpc[FinTech_LedgerService]
        ConfigFirebase[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    %% Application Layer (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    subgraph app [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        HelloController[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        HelloLogging[FinTech_AuthVault]
        HelloValidation[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        HelloUtils[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    %% Domain Layer (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    subgraph domain [FinTech_AuthVault]
        HelloRepo[FinTech_LedgerService]
        HelloEntity[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        DbEntity[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        
        HelloRepo -.->|"implements"| HelloEntity
    end

    %% Infrastructure Layer
    subgraph infra [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        direction TB
        
        subgraph transport [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            GrpcHandler[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            HttpHandler[FinTech_FraudDetection]
            HttpModel[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        end
        
        subgraph database [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
            MongoDb[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            MongoUtils[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        end
        
        subgraph external [FinTech_LedgerService]
            CloudflareService[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
            FirebaseService[FinTech_AuthVault]
        end
    end

    %% Generated Code Layer
    subgraph generated [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ProtobufHello[FinTech_LedgerService]
        GrpcHello[FinTech_AuthVault]
        ProtobufCommon[FinTech_LedgerService]
    end

    %% Proto Definitions
    subgraph proto [FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ProtoHello[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        ProtoCommon[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end

    %% Shared Packages
    subgraph pkg [FinTech_AuthVault]
        PkgNet[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        PkgJwt[FinTech_PaymentGateway] 
        PkgMongo[FinTech_LedgerService]
        PkgLogger[FinTech_LedgerService]
        PkgMain[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end

    %% Mock Layer
    subgraph mock [FinTech_FraudDetection]
        MockCaptcha[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end

    %% Dependencies Flow
    Makefile -->|"builds"| MainGo
    MainGo --> ConfigEnv
    MainGo --> ConfigGrpc  
    MainGo --> ConfigFirebase
    MainGo --> HelloController
    MainGo --> GrpcHandler
    MainGo --> HttpHandler
    MainGo --> MongoDb
    MainGo --> PkgNet
    MainGo --> PkgMain

    %% Application Layer Dependencies
    HelloController -->|"implements"| HelloRepo
        HelloController --> HelloLogging
        HelloLogging --> HelloRepo
        HelloController --> HelloValidation
        HelloController --> HelloUtils
    HelloController --> DbEntity
    HelloController --> ProtobufHello
    HelloController --> ProtobufCommon

    %% Transport Layer Dependencies
    GrpcHandler -->|"uses"| HelloRepo
        GrpcHandler --> PkgLogger
    GrpcHandler --> ProtobufHello
    HttpHandler -->|"uses"| HelloRepo
        HttpHandler --> PkgLogger
    HttpHandler --> ProtobufHello
    HttpHandler --> HttpModel
    HttpHandler --> PkgNet

    %% Infrastructure Dependencies
    MongoDb --> PkgMongo
    MongoDb --> DbEntity
    CloudflareService --> MockCaptcha
    FirebaseService --> ConfigFirebase

    %% Proto Generation
    ProtoHello -->|"protoc generates"| ProtobufHello
    ProtoHello -->|"protoc generates"| GrpcHello
    ProtoCommon -->|"protoc generates"| ProtobufCommon

    %% Styling
    classDef buildLayer fill:#FFE4E1,stroke:#FF6B6B,stroke-width:2px
    classDef appLayer fill:#E8F5E8,stroke:#4CAF50,stroke-width:2px
    classDef domainLayer fill:#E3F2FD,stroke:#2196F3,stroke-width:2px
    classDef infraLayer fill:#FFF3E0,stroke:#FF9800,stroke-width:2px
    classDef protoLayer fill:#F3E5F5,stroke:#9C27B0,stroke-width:2px
    classDef pkgLayer fill:#E0F2F1,stroke:#009688,stroke-width:2px
    classDef mockLayer fill:#FFFDE7,stroke:#FFC107,stroke-width:2px

    class build buildLayer
    class entry,config appLayer
    class domain domainLayer
    class infra infraLayer
    class generated,proto protoLayer
    class pkg pkgLayer
    class mock mockLayer

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 我们需要加一个处理 FinTech_TransactionQueue 和 FinTech_AuthVault 的环节。
